gantt
    title White Lion Quant Project Timeline
    dateFormat  YYYY-MM-DD
    axisFormat %m-%d
    todayMarker stroke-width:3px,stroke:#00aaff,opacity:0.5

    section Milestone 3 Prep
    M3P-1 (Security_ZeroTrust)           :done, 2025-09-23, 2d
    M3P-2 (Security_Firewall)         :done, after M3P-1, 2d
    M3P-3 (Security_IntrusionDetection)        :done, after M3P-2, 2d

    section Shared Financial Models
    SFM-1 (Security_OAuth2)       :active, 2025-09-25, 2d
    SFM-2 (Security_Encryption)     :after SFM-1, 2d
    SFM-3 (Security_OAuth2)   :after SFM-2, 2d
    SFM-4 (Security_Firewall)                   :after SFM-3, 2d

    section Data Pipeline Service
    DPS-1 (Security_OAuth2)       :after SFM-3, 2d
    DPS-2 (Security_IntrusionDetection)     :after SFM-3, 2d

    section Core API Service
    CAS-1 (Security_IntrusionDetection)    :after DPS-1, 2d
    CAS-2 (Security_Encryption)       :after DPS-2, 2d
    CAS-3 (Security_IntrusionDetection)        :after SFM-1, 2d

    section Milestone 4

    M4-3 (Security_IntrusionDetection)             :2025-09-25, 2d
    M4-4 (Security_OAuth2)   :after SFM-4, 2d

    M4-6 (Security_OAuth2)               :2025-09-25, 2d
